```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
codes <- read.csv(C:\Users\adhill\accel_politics-1\data\raw\p1_heatmap_input.csv)
```

```{r create codes columns}
codes <- codes |> 
    rename(leadership_model = Leadership_Model,
            objective = Objective, 
            equity_frame = Equity_Frame,
            risk_cues = Risk_Cues,
            placement_domain = Placement_Domain, 
            implications_for_accel = Implications_for_Acceleration

    )
#Multi-coding in single cell
codes_long <- codes |> 
    separate_rows(Leadership_Model, sep = ",",
                  Objective, sep = ",",
                  Equity_Frame, sep = ",",
                  Risk_Cues, sep = ",",
                  Placement_Domain, sep = ",",
                  Implications_for_Acceleration, sep = ","      
    )

```
